messages.message: hey Anant, for creating a custom one or for using it?

I have a simple use-case: a file that has many copies of same doc-type (each doc is 2-3 pages long -- think of 3 statements from Bank of America), and then one another tax form. I have to break it into individual copy of each document (3 bank-of-america statements separated out, and then the tax document separated out). (edited) 

What's the easiest way to do it?
